name: NEET simulator
description:
NEET simulator is a simulator game. Operate a NEET and observe his daily life.

Playing computer games and watching cartoon.

Buy garage kits and complete them.

Work online if you can't afford a new game.

Don't let your NEET die.

· 1 Fat NEET

· 75 games

· 40 animations and cartoons

· 50 garage kits

(press up down left right B and A to cheat)
